You can find the story of the session as tweeted here: [...] Siobhan Burke 2015-03-05T08:23:59+00:00 2015-03-05T08:23:59+00:00 Hairdressing Training service project officer - Job opportunity at Jisc Manchester https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;403db221.1503 Dear colleagues,<br><br>We are looking to recruit a Project Officer for the Hairdressing Training Service to support the delivery and continuing development of the service. The closing date for applications is 12:00 on Wednesday 18th March.<br><br>Best wishes,<br><br>Siobh\ufffd\ufffdn Burke<br><br>[Jisc]<http://www.jisc.ac.uk/><br><br>Siobh\ufffd\ufffdn Burke<br>OER Service Manager<br><br>T 0161 275 6803<br>Skype SiobhanBurke79<br>Twitter @SiobhanBurke79<br>5.14 Roscoe Building, University of Manchester, Oxford Road, Manchester M13 9PL [...] Siobhan Burke 2015-02-13T08:52:27+00:00 2015-02-13T08:52:27+00:00 OER15 Registration & Early bird until 16th February! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;5fccaf8f.1502 Dear Colleagues,<br><br>This is a reminder that registration is now open for OER15, the international conference on Open Educational Resources. The 'early bird' rate is available until February 16th. Our venue is the impressive Royal Welsh College of Music and Drama, Cardiff on 14-15 April 2015. Please register with us here: http://oer15.oerconf.org/.<br>The Open Education Conference is an International Conference currently organised by a volunteer committee from the Open Education Community and hosted by OER Wales Cymru, Universities Wales and the Association for Learning Technology (ALT). This is intended to provide an initial resource base to help learning providers [...] Louise Egan 2014-09-12T14:19:15+00:00 2014-09-12T14:19:15+00:00 September issue of the Learning, Teaching and Professional Skills e-bulletin https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;d7a996ab.1409 **Apologies for cross posting**<br><br>Dear Colleagues,<br><br>We bring to you a summer bumper edition of the Learning, Teaching and Professional Skills e-bulletin from Mimas. There has been numerous things happening at Mimas, with the biggest change is that we are now part of the Jisc family. From 1 August, Mimas, which was part of The University of Manchester, became part of the Digital Resources division, within educational charity Jisc<http://www.jisc.ac.uk/>. [...] Louise Egan 2014-09-12T10:53:02+00:00 2014-09-12T10:53:02+00:00 Launch of the new Hairdressing Training mobile App https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;a89672c1.1409 ***Apologies for cross posting***<br><br>We are pleased to announce that today the popular Hairdressing Training service has a new mobile app.<br><br>[cid:56E4BF50-E2FF-46F7-9216-38F406476351]<br><br>From today the existing portfolio of pioneering hairdressing and barbering training videos, from the award winning service \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Hairdressing Training<http://www.hairdressing.ac.uk/>, developed by Mimas, a part of Jisc will be presented and accessible via an easy to use mobile app. [...] Isa Davies 2014-08-26T14:24:50+01:00 2014-08-26T14:24:50+01:00 Re: Could you help us with our new Hairdressing Training App? https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;afa2db52.1408 Hi<br><br>Yes I would love to help.<br><br>From: Hairdressing Training [mailto:HAIRDRESSING@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On<br>Behalf Of Andrea Radford<br>Sent: 15 August 2014 09:37<br>To: HAIRDRESSING@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Re: Could you help us with our new Hairdressing Training App?<br><br>Hi<br><br>Yes<br><br>Andrea<br><br>From: Hairdressing Training [mailto:HAIRDRESSING@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On<br>Behalf Of steven roberts<br>Sent: 13 August 2014 20:07<br>To: HAIRDRESSING@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Re: Could you help us with our new Hairdressing Training App?
